column2: SO420 YORK WAY SOUTH JUNCTION TO CAMDEN ROADINCLINE JUNCTION

2 minutes.  All trains (Passenger and Freight) towards CTRL from the North London Line must stop at Signal AF41on approach to York Way South Junction for drivers to set up CSR (Cab Secure Radio) and change tractionsetting. This is due to the North London Line not having CSR coverage and CSR must be set up at the first signalberth on entering a new control area.
